Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

Mr. João Agostinho da Silva, owner of the cloths which, at the request of Your Excellency Antônio Francisco dos Santos Abreu, was to purchase, has come here to finally arrange them, as the said citizen Abreu states in the enclosed letter, and I send him to the presence of Your Excellency.

The aforementioned citizen Abreu asks me to obtain from Your Excellency Your Excellency

God keep Your Lordship Most Illustrious Sir Antônio Vicente da Fontoura, Minister of Finance. Domingos José de Almeida

It is in order. Domingos José de Almeida

Annex 2 to document CV-11.
